description: Con CVICO Negocios tu comercio aparecer en internet, podrs publicar y vender tus productos o servicios. Tambin recibirs ms formas de pago.  Somos tu aliado para crecer tu negocio!  1. Tendrs la mejor presencia de tu comercio en internet. Nuevos clientes te podrn encontrar donde realmente te estn buscando. 2. Podrs publicar tus productos o servicios. En nuestra App tendrs un catlogo que te ayudar a destacar lo mejor de tu inventario y as atraer ms clientes. 3. Recibirs ms pagos. Tus clientes podrn pagar tus productos o servicios en internet o usando nuestra APP. Podrs aceptar tarjetas de dbito, crdito y vender desde tu celular. With CVICO Negocios your business will appear on the internet, you can publish and sell your products or services. You will also receive more forms of payment.  We are your ally to grow your business!  1. You will have the best presence of your business on the internet. New clients will be able to find you where they are really looking for you. 2. You can publish your products or services. In our App you will have a catalog that will help you highlight the best of your inventory and thus attract more customers. 3. You will receive more payments. Your clients can pay for your products or services on the internet or using our APP. You can accept debit, credit cards and sell from your cell phone.
